data.name: Hero suffix quest
data.description:
- *Who dares to disturb us?*
- I do.
- *What do you want from us?*
- The Great Book of Water.
- *... you have to unlock all the doors to reach the water chamber, there you will be rewarded.  
The password is nth word on the list of ordered suffixes of text engraved above each door.  
If you fail, you will drown.  
This is your challenge. Prepare your hero.*

 

... and a mossy inscription above the entrance says:  
*Thou shall* `FindPassword(string engravedText, int numberOnTheDoor)`.   
*Thou shall be quicketh.*  
*Beware the order of same items, all shall be preserveth.*

---
A note on string ordering. Assume the `StringComparison.Ordinal` order.
